title: Crypto Tracker
description: A real-time cryptocurrency tracking application built with React and WebSockets. It features live price updates, historical data charts, and a customizable watchlist.

title: E-commerce Storefront
description: A full-featured e-commerce site using Next.js for server-side rendering and performance. Includes product pages, a shopping cart, and a checkout process.

title: Personal Blog Platform
description: A dynamic blog platform where users can read, write, and manage posts. Built with a Node.js/Express backend and a responsive React frontend.

title: Personal Blog Platform
description: A dynamic blog platform where users can read, write, and manage posts. Built with a Node.js/Express backend and a responsive React frontend.
